definition: to turn over/to flip over/to overturn/to rummage through/to translate/to decode/to double/to climb over or into/to cross
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.chinese: 在冬天莓鱸翻車魚移動深深。

sentences.english: And it just so happens that's a parasite hanging off the Mola.
sentences.chinese: 那就像掛在翻車魚身上的寄生蟲一樣。

sentences.english: In summer crappie will suspend in deeper water chasing shad.
sentences.chinese: 在夏天莓鱸翻車魚在追逐美洲河鯡的深水將暫停。

sentences.english: Molas are infamous for carrying tons of parasites.
sentences.chinese: 翻車魚以攜帶成噸的寄生蟲而聞名。

sentences.english: What kind of advice did the moonfish give Dory?
sentences.chinese: 翻車魚給了多莉什麼建議？

definition: extraordinary strength/super strong/strong as an ox
to postpone one's graduation (e.g. by undertaking additional studies) (abbr. for 延後畢業|延后毕业[yan2 hou4 bi4 ye4])
Andes mountain chain of South America
koinobori, a Japanese carp-shaped windsock flown to celebrate Children's Day
38th parallel, forming the DMZ border between North and South Korea
lit. the river that divides Chu and Han/fig. a line that divides rival territories/the mid-line between sides on a Chinese chessboard
to bore/to burrow/to crawl through a tunnel
